fullText: The Curious Incident of the Dog in the Night-Time is a stunning theatrical achievement that transforms Mark Haddon's beloved novel into a visually spectacular and emotionally resonant stage experience.
dtliExcerpt: The Curious Incident of the Dog in the Night-Time is a stunning theatrical achievement that transforms Mark Haddon's beloved novel into a visually spectacular and emotionally resonant stage experience.
